title: IGT Launches New, Integrated Website
text:
IGT
LONDON , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- International Game Technology PLC ("IGT") (NYSE:IGT) announced that it has launched its new Company website, www.IGT.com , to demonstrate its global leadership and enhance visitors' understanding of its business. The site provides customers, investors, and the industry with a single source of information about IGT's leading end-to-end gaming solutions across all channels and regulated segments.
"As we progress in our integration efforts, ensuring our stakeholders can connect seamlessly with our organization is a top priority," said Robert K. Vincent , IGT's Senior Vice President of Human Resources and Public Affairs. "The website applies the latest and best practices of web design for ease of navigation and a fresh, forward-looking, responsive design that's easily viewable on any device."
Visitors can locate information quickly through a simplified navigation menu that eliminates multiple clicks. The "Products and Services" menu presents the Company's comprehensive portfolio of solutions and services across the gaming, lottery, interactive, and betting segments, while "Explore IGT" offers details about the corporate, investor relations, careers, and media-facing information.
The new site integrates legacy GTECH and legacy IGT websites strategically in one place, which enhances IGT's Customer First approach. Visitors to the legacy websites will be automatically redirected to the new site.
About IGT
IGT (NYSE:IGT) is the global leader in gaming. We enable players to experience their favorite games across all channels and regulated segments, from Gaming Machines and Lotteries to Interactive and Social Gaming. Leveraging a wealth of premium content, substantial investment in innovation, in-depth customer intelligence, operational expertise and leading-edge technology, our gaming solutions anticipate the demands of consumers wherever they decide to play. We have a well-established local presence and relationships with governments and regulators in more than 100 countries around the world, and create value by adhering to the highest standards of service, integrity, and responsibility. IGT has approximately 13,000 employees. For more information, please visit www.IGT.com .
